TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectItemGroupElement extends Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElementContainer

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 專案中的 [ItemGroup 項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aac894e3-a9f1-4bbc-a796-6ef07001f35b)。

span.span: Represents an [ItemGroup Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aac894e3-a9f1-4bbc-a796-6ef07001f35b) in an MSBuild project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String) As ProjectItemElement

param.name: itemType
param.span: 要加入之項目 (Item) 的項目的項目 (Item Element) 名稱。

span.span: Item element name of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 包含要加入之項目的屬性。

span.span: Include attribute of the item to be added.

summary.span: 將新項目加入至項目群組中。

span.span: Adds a new item to the item group.

summary.span: 項目會先依照項目的項目 (Item Element) 名稱排序，再依照 Include 屬性排序。

span.span: Items are ordered first by item element name, and then by the Include attribute.

returns.span: 傳回新項目的項目 (Item Element)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此項便利的方法會挑選啟發學習法為基礎的 MSBuild DOM 中的位置。This convenience method picks a location in the MSBuild DOM based on a heuristic.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem (string itemType, string include, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string,string>> metadata);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectItemElement AddItem(string itemType, string include, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, string>> metadata) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (itemType As String, include As String, metadata As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, String))) As ProjectItemElement

public: Microsoft::Build::Construction::ProjectItemElement ^ AddItem(System::String ^ itemType, System::String ^ include, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::String ^>> ^ metadata);

param.name: itemType
param.span: 要加入之項目 (Item) 的項目的項目 (Item Element) 名稱。

span.span: Item element name of the item to be added.

param.name: include
param.span: 包含要加入之項目的屬性。

span.span: Include attribute of the item to be added.

summary.span: 將包含中繼資料的新項目加入至項目群組。

span.span: Adds a new item with metadata to the item group.

summary.span: 項目會先依照項目的項目 (Item Element) 名稱排序，再依照 Include 屬性排序。

span.span: Items are ordered first by item element name, and then by the Include attribute.

returns.span: 傳回新項目的項目 (Item Element)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Metadata`參數可以是 null，表示沒有中繼資料不存在。The `Metadata` parameter may be null, which indicates no metadata is present.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Items As ICollection(Of ProjectItemElement)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在列舉期間修改集合。The collection can be modified during enumeration.
